snippet.title: Airtight City: DEMO | 密闭之城1.0 | Full Game | No Commentary
snippet.description:
This is a TPS, horror-type action shooting game. The game will draw players into a terrifying dark world with detailed atmosphere rendering and weird story. Here, you are not defenseless, but even with a gun, you can't suppress the trembling from the heart. Game revenue is used for 2.0 development. Remember we are all human, so yes, I made mistakes. I hope you all enjoy :)

这是一款 TPS，恐怖类型的动作射击游戏。游戏将以细致的气氛渲染和诡异的故事将玩家带入一个可怕的黑暗世界。在这里，你不是手无寸铁，但就算有枪，也抑制不住心中的颤抖。游戏收入用于 2.0 开发。

请记住，我们都是人，所以，是的，我犯了错误。我希望你们都喜欢:)
